column4: I can't get the Number of Desktops in CompizConfig to go above 1.
so does anyone have ANY idea why i can't get the number of desktops to go above 1 in CompizConfig?
ccsm general settings--->virtual horizon desktops set to 4
but that dosen't work right with kicker
kicker won't let me go above one either
because i'm used to having multiple desktops.
and i can only have one.
best bet is to join the compiz channel-->how critical of a problem is this? sounds mainly aesthetic
it's more than aesthetic because it affects my productivity
